text: Can we please get a rollback on the new animations in the sidebar on the page builder? They are slow, clunky/chugging, and the easing doesn't match the rest of HubSpot's easing reveals...

Just curious, does the animation play smoother after you already focused a module once? (trying to determine if maybe the jankyness can be a result of us having code split out some of the panels, and them async loading at the same time an animation plays may look janky?)
sorry Brian, it doesn't... trying to get a HQ video for you to see it
<@UA886MF42> - the video doesn't do it justice on the chugging...
Also, the overall length/duration of the animation seems really long to me
I will say though, the animation is smoother, the more you traverse into the module... which seems a bit odd.... The closer to the parent setting you are, the more chugging there is
Oh man, I missed this notice and it tripped me today :stuck_out_tongue:
